verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord crucified
O mark Thy Holy Cross
On motive preference
All fond desires
On That which self
In any form inspires
Set Thou that sign of loss
Thy Holy Cross

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And when the touch
Of death is here and there
Laid on a thing
Most precious in our eyes
Let us not wonder
Let us recognize
The answer to this prayer
Thy Holy Cross
